mapper.insert: insert into yf_user (u_no, u_id, u_pw, u_name, u_auth) values (seq_yf_user.nextval, #{u_id}, #{u_pw}, #{u_name}, #{u_auth})
insert into yf_youtube (y_no, y_url, y_title) values (seq_yf_youtube.nextval, #{y_url}, #{y_title})
insert into yf_gallary (g_no, g_title, g_path) values (seq_yf_gallary.nextval, #{g_title}, #{g_path})
